name: sheets_write_cell
description: Write a value to a specific cell in a Google Spreadsheet. Uses the Name Box to navigate to the cell and then types the value into it.

parameters.name: cell
parameters.description: Target cell reference in A1 notation (e.g. 'A1', 'B5', 'C12')

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to write into the cell

steps.label: Wait for spreadsheet grid to load

steps.code: const nameBox = document.querySelector('#t-name-box input, input[aria-label="Name Box"], input.jfk-textinput'); if (!nameBox) return { error: 'Could not find Name Box input' }; nameBox.focus(); nameBox.click(); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 500)); nameBox.select(); document.execCommand('insertText', false, `{{cell}}`); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 300)); nameBox.dispatchEvent(new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, code: 'Enter', bubbles: true })); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 1000)); return { navigated: true, cell: `{{cell}}` }
steps.name: navigate_to_cell
steps.label: Navigate to the target cell using Name Box

steps.code: const cellInput = document.querySelector('.cell-input[contenteditable="true"], [id="cell-editor"] [contenteditable="true"], .cell-input, .formulabar-input [contenteditable="true"]'); if (cellInput) { cellInput.focus(); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 300)); document.execCommand('selectAll', false, null); document.execCommand('insertText', false, `{{value}}`); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 500)); cellInput.dispatchEvent(new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, code: 'Enter', bubbles: true })); } else { const waffle = document.querySelector('table.waffle'); const target = waffle || document.activeElement || document; target.dispatchEvent(new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, code: 'Enter', bubbles: true })); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 300)); document.execCommand('insertText', false, `{{value}}`); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 500)); const active = document.activeElement || target; active.dispatchEvent(new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, code: 'Enter', bubbles: true })); } await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 1000)); return { success: true, cell: `{{cell}}`, value: `{{value}}`, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: write_result
steps.label: Type value into the cell and confirm with Enter
